description: All tables related to Azure CosmosDB Service.

tables.name: CDBDataPlaneRequests
tables.description: The DataPlaneRequests table captures every data plane operation for the Cosmos DB account. Data Plane requests are operations executed to create, update, delete or retrieve data within the account.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp (in UTC) when the data plane request was issued.

columns.name: AccountName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB account.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The specific data plane operation executed against the account.

columns.name: ConnectionMode
columns.description: The connection mode used by the client issuing the request – (Direct or Gateway mode).

columns.name: ActivityId
columns.description: The unique identifier (GUID) for this data plane operation

columns.name: UserAgent
columns.description: The name of the user specified user agent suffix (as specified when initializing the Cosmos DB client) when running in Direct mode.

columns.name: RequestResourceType
columns.description: The Cosmos DB resource type within the account against which the data plane request was executed, can be one of Database, Collection, Document, Attachment, User, Permission, StoredProcedure, Trigger, UserDefinedFunction, Offer.

columns.name: RequestResourceId
columns.description: The ID of the specific Cosmos DB resource within the account against which the data plane request was executed.

columns.name: StatusCode
columns.description: The HTTP status code response for the data plane request, highlighting details of the success/failure of the request.

columns.name: ClientIpAddress
columns.description: The IP address of the client VM issuing the request.

columns.name: RequestCharge
columns.description: The RUs (Request Units) consumed by this operation.

columns.name: DurationMs
columns.description: The server-side execution time (in milliseconds) for this request.

columns.name: RequestLength
columns.description: The payload size (in bytes) for the request.

columns.name: ResponseLength
columns.description: The payload size (in bytes) of the server response.

columns.name: RegionName
columns.description: The Azure region to which this request was issued.

columns.name: PartitionId
columns.description: The physical partition ID for the Cosmos DB container against which the request was issued.

columns.name: AadAppliedRoleAssignmentId
columns.description: The ID of the applied role assignment for the caller issuing the data plane request.

columns.name: AadPrincipalId
columns.description: The AAD Principal ID of the caller issuing the data plane request.

columns.name: DatabaseName
columns.description: The Cosmos DB database against which the request was issued.

columns.name: CollectionName
columns.description: The Cosmos DB container against which the request was issued.

columns.name: ResourceTokenPermissionId
columns.description: The ID of the resource token associated with the resource accessed by this request.

columns.name: ResourceTokenPermissionMode
columns.description: The permission mode of the resource token associated with the resource accessed by this request.

columns.name: ResourceTokenUserRid
columns.description: The user ID associated with the resource token for the resource accessed by this request.

columns.name: KeyType
columns.description: The authorization type (Primary/Secondary Read/Write key) for this request when running in Direct mode.

columns.name: AuthTokenType
columns.description: The authorization type (System Read/Write key) for this request by the Cosmos DB Gateway service when running in Gateway mode or using the REST API.

tables.name: CDBDataPlaneRequests5M
tables.description: The CDBDataPlaneRequests5M table consolidates logs for data-plane requests every five minutes. These logs are aggregated based on the columns in the CDBDataPlaneRequests table. For detailed information about the log context, please refer to the CDBDataPlaneRequests table.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp (in UTC) of the 5 minute interval for the aggregation.

columns.name: AccountName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB account.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The specific data plane operation executed against the account.

columns.name: ConnectionMode
columns.description: The connection mode used by the client issuing the requests in the interval – (Direct or Gateway mode).

columns.name: UserAgent
columns.description: The name of the user specified user agent suffix (as specified when initializing the Cosmos DB client) when running in Direct mode.

columns.name: RequestResourceType
columns.description: The Cosmos DB resource type within the account against which the data plane requests in the interval were executed, can be one of Database, Collection, Document, Attachment, User, Permission, StoredProcedure, Trigger, UserDefinedFunction, Offer.

columns.name: RequestResourceId
columns.description: The ID of the specific Cosmos DB resource within the account against which the data plane requests in the interval were executed.

columns.name: StatusCode
columns.description: The HTTP status code response for the data plane request, highlighting details of the success/failure of the request.

columns.name: ClientIpAddress
columns.description: The IP address of the client VM issuing the requests in the interval.

columns.name: TotalRequestCharge
columns.description: The total RUs (Request Units) consumed by all operations in this interval.

columns.name: AvgRequestCharge
columns.description: The average RUs (Request Units) consumed by an operation in this interval.

columns.name: MaxRequestCharge
columns.description: The maximum number of RUs (Request Units) consumed by an operation in this interval.

columns.name: TotalDurationMs
columns.description: The sum of the server-side execution times (in milliseconds) for the requests in this interval.

columns.name: AvgDurationMs
columns.description: The average server-side execution times (in milliseconds) for the requests in this interval.

columns.name: MaxDurationMs
columns.description: The highest server-side execution time (in milliseconds) of a request in this interval.

columns.name: TotalRequestLength
columns.description: The total payload size (in bytes) for the all requests in this interval.

columns.name: AvgRequestLength
columns.description: The average payload size (in bytes) for the requests in this interval.

columns.name: MaxRequestLength
columns.description: The highest payload size (in bytes) for a request in this interval.

columns.name: TotalResponseLength
columns.description: The total payload size (in bytes) of the server response in this interval.

columns.name: AvgResponseLength
columns.description: The average payload size (in bytes) of the server response in this interval.

columns.name: MaxResponseLength
columns.description: The highest payload size (in bytes) of the server response in this aggregation.

columns.name: RegionName
columns.description: The Azure region to which the requests in this interval were issued.

columns.name: PartitionId
columns.description: The physical partition ID for the Cosmos DB container against which the requests in this interval were issued.

columns.name: AadAppliedRoleAssignmentId
columns.description: The ID of the applied role assignment for the caller issuing the data plane requests in this interval.

columns.name: AadPrincipalId
columns.description: The AAD Principal ID of the caller issuing the data plane requests in this interval.

columns.name: DatabaseName
columns.description: The Cosmos DB database against which the requests in this interval were issued.

columns.name: CollectionName
columns.description: The Cosmos DB container against which the requests in this interval were issued.

columns.name: ResourceTokenPermissionId
columns.description: The ID of the resource token associated with the resource accessed by the requests in this interval.

columns.name: ResourceTokenPermissionMode
columns.description: The permission mode of the resource token associated with the resource accessed by this requests in this interval.

columns.name: ResourceTokenUserRid
columns.description: The user ID associated with the resource token for the resource accessed by the requests in this interval.

columns.name: KeyType
columns.description: The authorization type (Primary/Secondary Read/Write key) for this request set when running in Direct mode.

columns.name: AuthTokenType
columns.description: The authorization type (System Read/Write key) for this request set by the Cosmos DB Gateway service when running in Gateway mode or using the REST API.
The number of requests aggregated in this interval.

tables.name: CDBDataPlaneRequests15M
tables.description: The CDBDataPlaneRequests5M table consolidates logs for data-plane requests every fifteen minutes. These logs are aggregated based on the columns in the CDBDataPlaneRequests table. For detailed information about the log context, please refer to the CDBDataPlaneRequests table.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp (in UTC) of the 15 minute interval for the aggregation.

columns.name: AccountName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB account.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The specific data plane operation executed against the account.

columns.name: ConnectionMode
columns.description: The connection mode used by the client issuing the requests in the interval – (Direct or Gateway mode).

columns.name: UserAgent
columns.description: The name of the user specified user agent suffix (as specified when initializing the Cosmos DB client) when running in Direct mode.

columns.name: RequestResourceType
columns.description: The Cosmos DB resource type within the account against which the data plane requests in the interval were executed, can be one of Database, Collection, Document, Attachment, User, Permission, StoredProcedure, Trigger, UserDefinedFunction, Offer.

columns.name: RequestResourceId
columns.description: The ID of the specific Cosmos DB resource within the account against which the data plane requests in the interval were executed.

columns.name: StatusCode
columns.description: The HTTP status code response for the data plane request set, highlighting details of the success/failure of the request set.

columns.name: ClientIpAddress
columns.description: The IP address of the client VM issuing the requests in the interval.

columns.name: TotalRequestCharge
columns.description: The total RUs (Request Units) consumed by all operations in this interval.

columns.name: AvgRequestCharge
columns.description: The average RUs (Request Units) consumed by an operation in this interval.

columns.name: MaxRequestCharge
columns.description: The maximum number of RUs (Request Units) consumed by an operation in this interval.

columns.name: TotalDurationMs
columns.description: The sum of the server-side execution times (in milliseconds) for the requests in this interval.

columns.name: AvgDurationMs
columns.description: The average server-side execution times (in milliseconds) for the requests in this interval.

columns.name: MaxDurationMs
columns.description: The highest server-side execution time (in milliseconds) of a request in this interval.

columns.name: TotalRequestLength
columns.description: The total payload size (in bytes) for the all requests in this interval.

columns.name: AvgRequestLength
columns.description: The average payload size (in bytes) for the requests in this interval.

columns.name: MaxRequestLength
columns.description: The highest payload size (in bytes) for a request in this interval.

columns.name: TotalResponseLength
columns.description: The total payload size (in bytes) of the server response in this interval.

columns.name: AvgResponseLength
columns.description: The average payload size (in bytes) of the server response in this interval.

columns.name: MaxResponseLength
columns.description: The highest payload size (in bytes) of the server response in this aggregation.

columns.name: RegionName
columns.description: The Azure region to which the requests in this interval were issued.

columns.name: PartitionId
columns.description: The physical partition ID for the Cosmos DB container against which the requests in this interval were issued.

columns.name: AadAppliedRoleAssignmentId
columns.description: The ID of the applied role assignment for the caller issuing the data plane requests in this interval.

columns.name: AadPrincipalId
columns.description: The AAD Principal ID of the caller issuing the data plane requests in this interval.

columns.name: DatabaseName
columns.description: The Cosmos DB database against which the requests in this interval were issued.

columns.name: CollectionName
columns.description: The Cosmos DB container against which the requests in this interval were issued.

columns.name: ResourceTokenPermissionId
columns.description: The ID of the resource token associated with the resource accessed by the requests in this interval.

columns.name: ResourceTokenPermissionMode
columns.description: The permission mode of the resource token associated with the resource accessed by this requests in this interval.

columns.name: ResourceTokenUserRid
columns.description: The user ID associated with the resource token for the resource accessed by the requests in this interval.

columns.name: KeyType
columns.description: The authorization type (Primary/Secondary Read/Write key) for this request set when running in Direct mode.

columns.name: AuthTokenType
columns.description: The authorization type (System Read/Write key) for this request set by the Cosmos DB Gateway service when running in Gateway mode or using the REST API.
The number of requests aggregated in this interval.

tables.name: CDBPartitionKeyStatistics
tables.description: This table provides outlier logical partition keys that have consumed more storage space than others. Statistics are based on a sub-sampling of partition keys within the collection and hence these are approximate. Partition keys that are below 1GB of storage may not show up in the reported statistics.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp (in UTC) when statistics for this logical partition key were generated.

columns.name: AccountName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB account containing the dataset for which partition key stats were generated.

columns.name: RegionName
columns.description: The Azure region from which statistics for this partition were retrieved.

columns.name: PartitionKey
columns.description: The logical partition key for which storage statistics were retrieved.

columns.name: SizeKb
columns.description: The storage size (in KB) for the logical partition key within the physical partition.

columns.name: DatabaseName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB database, which contains the partition.

columns.name: CollectionName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB collection, which contains the partition.

tables.name: CDBPartitionKeyRUConsumption
tables.description: This table details the RU (Request Unit) consumption for logical partition keys in each region, within each of their physical partitions. This data can be used to identify hot partitions from a request volume perspective.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp (in UTC) when the request against the physical partition was issued.

columns.name: AccountName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB account containing the physical partition.

columns.name: ActivityId
columns.description: The unique identifier (GUID) which can be correlated with the CDBDataPlaneRequests table for additional debugging.

columns.name: PartitionKey
columns.description: The logical partition key for which RU (Request Unit) consumption statistics were retrieved.

columns.name: PartitionKeyRangeId
columns.description: The physical partition containing the logical partition key against which the RU (Request Unit) consuming operation was issued.
The data plane operation that consumed RUs (Request Units) for this logical partition key.

columns.name: RegionName
columns.description: The Azure region from which statistics for this partition were retrieved.

columns.name: DatabaseName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB database, which contains the partition.

columns.name: CollectionName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB collection, which contains the partition.

columns.name: RequestCharge
columns.description: The RUs (Request Units) consumed by this request.

tables.name: CDBQueryRuntimeStatistics
tables.description: This table details query operations executed against a SQL API account. By default, the query text and its parameters are obfuscated to avoid logging PII data with full text query logging available by request.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp (in UTC) when this query operation was executed.

columns.name: AccountName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB account against which the query operation was issued.

columns.name: DatabaseName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB database containing the Cosmos DB container against which this query was issued.

columns.name: CollectionName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB container against which this query was issued.

columns.name: PartitionKeyRangeId
columns.description: The physical partition to which this query was issued.

columns.name: QueryText
columns.description: The query text (obfuscated by default, full query string provided upon request) for the operation.

columns.name: ActivityId
columns.description: The unique identifier (GUID) for each execution of this query, which can be correlating with the CDBDataPlaneRequests table for additional debugging.

columns.name: CorrelatedActivityId
columns.description: The unique identifier (GUID) for this query operation, which can be used to link multiple executions of the same query.

tables.name: CDBMongoRequests
tables.description: This table details data plane operations, specifically for Mongo API accounts.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp (in UTC) of the Mongo API data plane request.

columns.name: AccountName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB account against which this Mongo API request was issued.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The Mongo API operation that was executed

columns.name: UserAgent
columns.description: The user agent suffix associated with the client issuing the request.

columns.name: OpCode
columns.description: The operation code for the Mongo API request.

columns.name: ActivityId
columns.description: The unique identifier (GUID) for this Mongo API request.

columns.name: ErrorCode
columns.description: The error code (if applicable) for this request.

columns.name: DurationMs
columns.description: The server-side execution time (in ms) for this request.

columns.name: RequestCharge
columns.description: The RU (Request Unit) consumption for this request.

columns.name: DatabaseName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB database against which this request was issued.

columns.name: CollectionName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB container against which this request was issued.

columns.name: AuthorizationTokenType
columns.description: The authorization token used  for this request.

columns.name: RetryCount
columns.description: The number of server side retries executed for this request.

columns.name: Address
columns.description: The IP address of the client VM which issued the request.

columns.name: PIICommandText
columns.description: Full text query (if opted in) for this Mongo API request.

columns.name: RateLimitingDelayMs
columns.description: The estimated time (in ms) spent retrying due to rate limited operations.

columns.name: RetriedDueToRateLimiting
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if this request was retried server side due to throttles.

columns.name: RegionName
columns.description: The region against which this request was issued.

columns.name: RequestLength
columns.description: The payload size (in bytes) of the request.

columns.name: ResponseLength
columns.description: The payload size (in bytes) of the server response.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: The user ID associated with the client issuing the request.

tables.name: CDBCassandraRequests
tables.description: This table details data plane operations, specifically for Cassandra API accounts.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp (in UTC) of the Cassandra API data plane request.

columns.name: AccountName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB account against which this request was issued.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The Cassandra API operation that was executed.

columns.name: UserAgent
columns.description: The user agent suffix of the client issuing the request.

columns.name: ActivityId
columns.description: The unique identifier (GUID) for this Cassandra API request.

columns.name: ErrorCode
columns.description: The error code (if applicable) for this request.

columns.name: DurationMs
columns.description: The server side execution time (in ms) for this request.

columns.name: RequestCharge
columns.description: The RU (Request Unit) consumption for this request.

columns.name: DatabaseName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB database against which this request was issued.

columns.name: CollectionName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB table/container against which this request was issued.

columns.name: AuthorizationTokenType
columns.description: The authorization token used for this request.

columns.name: RetryCount
columns.description: The number of server side retries issued for this request.

columns.name: Address
columns.description: The IP address of the client that issued this request.

columns.name: PIICommandText
columns.description: Full query text with parameters (if opted in) for this request.

columns.name: RateLimitingDelayMs
columns.description: The estimated time (in ms) spent in retrying due to rate limited operations.

columns.name: RetriedDueToRateLimiting
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if this request was retried server side due to throttles.

columns.name: RegionName
columns.description: The region against which this request was issued.

columns.name: RequestLength
columns.description: The payload size (in bytes) of the request.

columns.name: ResponseLength
columns.description: The payload size (in bytes) of the server response.

tables.name: CDBGremlinRequests
tables.description: This table details data plane operations, specifically for Graph API accounts.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp (in UTC) when this Graph API operation was executed on the server.

columns.name: AccountName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB account against which this request was issued.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The name of the Gremlin operation that was executed.

columns.name: UserAgent
columns.description: The user agent suffix of the client issuing the request.

columns.name: ErrorCode
columns.description: The error code (if applicable) for this request.

columns.name: AuthorizationTokenType
columns.description: The authorization token used  for this request.

columns.name: RetryCount
columns.description: The number of server side retries issued for this request.

columns.name: Address
columns.description: The IP address of the client, which issued this request.

columns.name: PIICommandText
columns.description: Full query with parameters (if opted in) for this request.

columns.name: RateLimitingDelayMs
columns.description: The estimated time (in ms) spent retrying due to rate limited operations.

columns.name: RetriedDueToRateLimiting
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if this request was retried server side due to throttles.

columns.name: DatabaseName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB database against which this request was issued.

columns.name: CollectionName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB table/container against which this request was issued.

columns.name: DurationMs
columns.description: The server-side execution time (in ms) for this request.

columns.name: RequestCharge
columns.description: The RUs (Request Units) consumed by this operation.

columns.name: RequestLength
columns.description: The payload size (in bytes) of the request.

columns.name: ResponseLength
columns.description: The payload size (in bytes) of the server response.

columns.name: RegionName
columns.description: The region against which this request was issued.

columns.name: ActivityId
columns.description: The unique identifier (GUID) for this Graph API request.

tables.name: CDBTableApiRequests
tables.description: This table details data plane operations, specifically for Table API accounts.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp (in UTC) of the Table API data plane request.

columns.name: AccountName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB account against which this request was issued.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The Table API operation that was executed.

columns.name: UserAgent
columns.description: The user agent suffix of the client issuing the request.

columns.name: ActivityId
columns.description: The unique identifier (GUID) for this Table API request.

columns.name: ErrorCode
columns.description: The error code (if applicable) for this request.

columns.name: DurationMs
columns.description: The server side execution time (in ms) for this request.

columns.name: RequestCharge
columns.description: The RU (Request Unit) consumption for this request.

columns.name: TableName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB table against which this request was issued.

columns.name: AuthorizationTokenType
columns.description: The authorization token used for this request.

columns.name: Address
columns.description: The IP address of the client that issued this request.

columns.name: ClientRequestId
columns.description: The unique client request identifier (GUID) for this Table API request.

columns.name: PIICommandText
columns.description: Full query text with parameters (if opted in) for this request.

columns.name: RegionName
columns.description: The region against which this request was issued.

columns.name: RequestLength
columns.description: The payload size (in bytes) of the request.

columns.name: ResponseLength
columns.description: The payload size (in bytes) of the server response.

tables.name: CDBControlPlaneRequests
tables.description: This table details all control plane operations executed on the account, which include modifications to the regional failover policy, indexing policy, IAM role assignments, backup/restore policies, VNet and firewall rules, private links as well as updates and deletes of the account.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp (in UTC) when this Control Plane operation was executed against the Cosmos DB account.

columns.name: AccountName
columns.description: The name of the Cosmos DB account.

columns.name: ActivityId
columns.description: The Activity ID of the operation.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The Control Plane Operation that was executed.

columns.name: HttpStatusCode
columns.description: The HTTP status code of the control plane operation.

columns.name: Result
columns.description: The result of the operation indicating either success or failure.

columns.name: RegionName
columns.description: The region in which this control plan operation was executed.

columns.name: HttpMethod
columns.description: The HTTP method issued for this control plane operation.

columns.name: CurrentWriteRegion
columns.description: The current write region for this account (applies when a regional failover is triggered to choose a new write region).

columns.name: NewWriteRegion
columns.description: The new write region for the Cosmos DB account (after a user-initiated failover operation is executed).

columns.name: IpRangeFilter
columns.description: The IP range filter specified as part of the VNet rules for the Cosmos DB account.

columns.name: EnableVirtualNetworkFilter
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if VNet filters were enabled for the account.

columns.name: VirtualNetworkResourceEntries
columns.description: The list of IP addresses being included as part of the VNet rule for the account.

columns.name: EnablePrivateEndpointConnection
columns.description: Boolean flag to enable private endpoints for the Cosmos DB account.

columns.name: PrivateEndpointConnections
columns.description: The list of private endpoints for the Cosmos DB account (in each region).

columns.name: PrivateEndpointArmUrl
columns.description: The ARM URL of the private endpoint created for the account.

columns.name: DefaultConsistencyLevel
columns.description: The default consistency level for the Cosmos DB account.

columns.name: EnableAutomaticFailover
columns.description: Boolean flag to enable automatic failover for the Cosmos DB account.

columns.name: MaxStalenessIntervalInSeconds
columns.description: The maximum staleness value (in seconds) for the Cosmos DB account when using the Bounded Staleness consistency setting.

columns.name: MaxStalenessPrefix
columns.description: The max staleness prefix for the Cosmos DB account when using the Bounded Staleness consistency setting.

columns.name: MultipleWriteLocations
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if the Cosmos DB account is a multi-master account.

columns.name: Cors
columns.description: Collection of account’s Cross Origin Resource Sharing Rules
The time (in minutes) between consecutive backup snapshots for the Cosmos DB account. Valid range: 60 - 1440 minutes.
The duration of time (in hours) for which backup snapshots are retained for the Cosmos DB account. Valid range: 8 - 720 hours.

columns.name: BackupStorageRedundancy
columns.description: The type of backup storage redundancy for the Cosmos DB account.

columns.name: TargetBackupMode
columns.description: The backup mode after update. This can be either Continuous or Periodic.

columns.name: TargetContinuousTier
columns.description: The continuous tier after updating. This can be either Continuous7Days or Continuous30Days.

columns.name: VnetResourceGroupName
columns.description: The name of the resource group within which the VNet is created.

columns.name: VirtualNetworkName
columns.description: The name of the Vnet for the account.

columns.name: VnetDatabaseAccountEntries
columns.description: The list of virtual networks specified for the account.

columns.name: AcledSubnets
columns.description: The ACL’d subnets for the account.

columns.name: VnetLocation
columns.description: The Azure region in which the VNet for the account is location.

columns.name: VnetArmUrl
columns.description: The ARM URL for the VNet for the account.

columns.name: SqlQueryTextTraceType
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if full query text logging is enabled.

columns.name: EnableDataPlaneRequestsTrace
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if diagnostic logs are enabled for all Data Plane Operations.

columns.name: EnableControlPlaneRequestsTrace
columns.description: Boolean flag indicting if diagnostic logs are enabled for Control Plane operations.

columns.name: EnableMongoRequestsTrace
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if diagnostic logs are enabled for all Mongo API operations.

columns.name: EnableCassandraRequestsTrace
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if diagnostic logs are enabled for all Cassandra API operations.

columns.name: EnableGremlinRequestsTrace
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if diagnostic logs are enabled for Gremlin operations.

columns.name: DurationMs
columns.description: The time taken (in milliseconds) for this control plane operation to complete.

columns.name: RoleDefinitionId
columns.description: The Id of the IAM role created for the account.

columns.name: RoleDefinitionName
columns.description: The name of the IAM role created for the account.

columns.name: RoleDefinitionType
columns.description: The type of IAM role created for the account.

columns.name: RoleDefinitionAssignableScopes
columns.description: The assignable scopes for the IAM role created for the account.

columns.name: RoleDefinitionPermissions
columns.description: The permissions associated with the IAM role created for the account.

columns.name: RoleAssignmentId
columns.description: The role assignment Id for the IAM role created for the account.

columns.name: AssociatedRoleDefinitionId
columns.description: The ID of the IAM role definition for the IAM role created for the account.

columns.name: RoleAssignmentPrincipalId
columns.description: The Principal ID associated with the IAM Role Assignment created for the account.

columns.name: RoleAssignmentPrincipalType
columns.description: The Principal type of the IAM role assignment created for the account.

columns.name: RoleAssignmentScope
columns.description: The scope of access for the IAM role created for the account.

columns.name: ApiKind
columns.description: The API kind for the account (SQL, Graph, Mongo, Cassanda, Table) that is specified during account creation.

columns.name: ApiKindResourceType
columns.description: The resource against which this Control Plane operation was executed (e.g. Database, Container etc.)

columns.name: OperationType
columns.description: The type of control plane operation, which was executed. Examples of operations included Add/Remove region, Indexing Policy updates, VNet and firewall rule creation, Backup Retention Policy changes etc.

columns.name: ResourceUri
columns.description: The URI of the Cosmos DB resource (e.g. Database, Container) against which the control plane operation was execution.

columns.name: ResourceDetails
columns.description: The specific resource within the account against which the Control Plane Operation was executed. For e.g. the index for the container for which the indexing policy was created or updated.

columns.name: IsServiceManagedFailover
columns.description: Boolean flag to indicate if the failover event was initiated by the service or by the customer.
